doc.field: SOUTHERN SO> UNIT PREFERRED OFFERING UNDERWAY

Lead underwriter PaineWebber Group Inc PWJ> said an offering of two mln shares of the Class A preferred stock of Southern Co's Georgia Power Co subsidiary is underway at 25 dlrs per share. It said the underwriters won the issue at competitive sale today on a bid of 23.812 dlrs per share. The shares are not redeemable through refunding operations before June 1, 1992, when a sinking fund will start retiring the issue. Reuter
